entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
